thread.title_full: Labour MEPs: CBI report is further evidence UK is better off in EU (S&D - ... - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Labour MEPs: CBI report is further evidence UK is better off in EU (S&D - ...
text: ( Source : S&D - Group of the Progressive Alliance of Socialists & Democrats ) Labour MEPs have welcomed today's CBI report on Britain's membership of the EU as yet more proof the UK is better off inside the European Union than out.
